response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you, valued at $800,000. I am offering this remarkable item at a special price, which I believe will be highly attractive to you. Please consider the following offer: $750,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure a piece that could significantly enhance your life or business, and I am confident it will meet your expectations. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate this transaction with you soon.", "product_price": 750000}
